Package view

Class AppMenu

java.lang.Object
view.AppMenu
public class AppMenu extends Object
This class contains the main menu for the application as well as the multiple sub menus that will be used to prompt the user for various inputs based on their choice (with proper validation). It also contains the methods that will be used to display the results of the user's choice. Most methods will be called from the AppController class.
Version:
1.0
